question: Which organ express and secretes the hormone FGF21?
ideal_answer: Fibroblast growth factor 21 (FGF21) is an important endocrine metabolic regulator expressed in multiple tissues including liver and adipose tissue. Although highest levels of expression are in pancreas, little is known about the function of FGF21 in this tissue.

snippets.text: We have previously shown that Fibroblast growth factor 21 (Fgf21) is expressed in the thymus as well as in the liver.

Fibroblast growth factor 21 (FGF21) is an important endocrine metabolic regulator expressed in multiple tissues including liver and adipose tissue. Although highest levels of expression are in pancreas, little is known about the function of FGF21 in this tissue.
